name: Demon Castle: Bloodstained Night
description:
Octobyte Games is happy to present Demon Castle : Bloodstained Night.  This whipping action game will see you slaying Demons across an evil castle!  It's built from the ground up for mobile, but is easily playable (and free) on PC.  It's a short bit of fun and I hope you like it.  If you want to support me, please consider purchasing the android version!

Controls can be reassigned by pressing Control + Y, but the default is

Arrow Keys - Movement

Jump - Shift

Whip - Control

Subweapon - Enter

Alt+F4 - Exit
